## Simulate Graph and Covariates

```{r}
library(SpecClustPack)
covProbMat = matrix(c(.6, .2, .2, .6), nrow = 2)
nMembers = c(50, 50)
covMat = simBernCovar(covProbMat, nMembers)
blockPMat = matrix(c(.3, .1, .1, .3), nrow = 2)
adjMat = simSBM(blockPMat, nMembers)
```
## Apply CASC

```{r}
casc(adjMat, covMat, nBlocks = 2)
```
